text: The iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max are mobile phones made by Apple. They are the ones successor of iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max. These phones were introduced at an Apple event nicknamed “Wonderlust” in September 2023. People could order it on September 9, 2023. They could buy it on September 22, 2023. They are now discontinued, now that the IPhone 16 Pro has been released. == Features == The biggest change in the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max is the USB-C port. These pro models works USB Type-C 3.0 which is industry standard now. iPhone 15 Pro has Nano-SIM and e-SIM works, LTPO Super Retina XDR AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate, 48 MP rear camera, 12 MP selfie camera which can record up to 4K 60fps, and Face ID for security. iPhone 15 Pro comes in the four colors: Black Titanium, White Titanium, Blue Titanium, and Natural Titanium. == Cost == The base model of the iPhone 15 Pro has 256GB storage memory and 8GB of RAM. If costs $999. It became available starting on 22 September, 2023. == Related pages == *iPhone 15 == References == == Other websites == * Category:IPhone Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2023
title: IPhone 15 Pro
